title: Hydration Benefits
fact: Drinking water can boost your metabolism by up to 30% for about an hour.

title: Exercise & Mental Health
fact: Regular exercise can be as effective as antidepressants in treating mild to moderate depression.

title: Sleep Quality
fact: Getting 7-9 hours of sleep per night can improve immune function and reduce inflammation.

title: Walking Benefits
fact: Just 30 minutes of walking a day can reduce your risk of heart disease by 35%.

title: Stress Management
fact: Deep breathing exercises can lower cortisol levels and reduce stress in just 5 minutes.

title: Nutrition Timing
fact: Eating protein within 30 minutes after exercise helps maximize muscle recovery and growth.

title: Cardiovascular Health
fact: Laughing for 15 minutes a day can improve your blood vessel function and increase blood flow.

title: Brain Health
fact: Regular meditation can increase gray matter density in areas of the brain associated with learning and memory.

title: Bone Strength
fact: Weight-bearing exercises like walking, running, or dancing can help prevent osteoporosis.

title: Healthy Eating
fact: Eating a diet rich in fruits and vegetables can reduce your risk of chronic diseases by up to 20%.
